/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. Buildings and trees line the sides of the road, adding depth and context to the image. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the cars and buildings.
